titleStmt.title: The Second booke of ayres containing pastorall dialogues for two voyces, to sing either to the theorbo, harpsicon, or basse violl also short ayres for three voyces, with a thorow basse / composed by many excellent masters in musick now living.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by Thomas Harper for John Playford, and are to bee [sic] sold at his shop ...,

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of original in British Library.
